page.title: 18Recreation:Trekenner Pupils
page.content: The favourite team game in June 1985 is rounders for both sexes.French elastics is the favourite girls game and the boys is football although some children play both.In winter board games like Monopoly,Risk and Cluedo are popular.The girls in school play netball in the spring and autumn while the boys play football.In the summer term the boys and girls play rounders. At Trekenner school the 8-11 yr.pupils take part in the AAA Five Star Award Scheme.This year 27 pupils gained the following awards: {AWARD LEVEL 3 EVENTS PENTATHLON 1 * 2 pupils 2 pupils 2 ** 5 " 8 " 3 *** 11 " 11 " 4 **** 4 " 4 " 5 ***** 5 " 2 " { * * * * *
